entry.title: PAN · Premium Handcrafted Acacia (KOA) Prescription Sunglasses frame
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bewell of North America LLC
Type: Wooden Sunglasses
Price: 49.00

Premium Handcrafted Acacia (KOA) Pan prescription Sunglasses frame without the lens

if you are looking for prescription sunglasses, look no further, this Acacia (KOA) is the only prescription sunglass frame we carry at the moment. 

Upgrade Your Sight & Your Style

  • Great detail and care put in to ensure these etched all-natural and lightweight Acacia (KOA) frames stand out. 
  • Frame material: made with 100% natural lightweight Acacia (KOA)
  • it is for prescription purpose, no lenses - Please take the wood frame to any optical store to get the right prescription lens to fit your personal eyesight need.
  • No Lens
  • Frame only (to be fitted with prescription lens)
  • Size:
    • Lens frame width: 48 mm;
    • Bridge: 25mm;
    • Temple:140mm;
    • Frame width: 140mm
    • Pantos shape
  • Stainless Steel double spring hinges for universal fit; Built to bend not break.
  • Real original custom floating frames 
  • It comes with a free veneer case, microfibre cloth to keep your shade safe and clean.

-your eyes are important and need to be protected!

-It is also a Perfect Gift for Yourself or Your Loved ones. Whether it’s a birthday, anniversary, Valentine’s Day, Father’s Day, Graduation, or Christmas, our sunglasses make a fantastic gift. We also offer to personalize engraving service to make it more special for you.
